H0.text: Watching television five hours a day is the behavior that will best help a student stay healthy.

H1.text: Sleeping three hours each night is the behavior that best helps a student stay healthy.

H2.text: Eating fruits and vegetables each day is the behavior that will best help a student stay healthy.

H3.text: Exercising once a month is the behavior that will best help a student stay healthy.

A4.text: Eat lots of fruits and vegetables.

A5.text: A diet consisting predominantly of fruits, vegetables, legumes, nuts, seeds, plant protein and fatty fish with reduced consumption of saturated fat, salt and ultra-processed food.
